properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 6 at 9:02PM EST until February 7 at 9:24AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Falling Creek near East Juliette  affecting Jones County

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties


...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
Little River near Newborn affecting Morgan and Newton Counties

Little River near Eatonton affecting Putnam County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Falling Creek near East Juliette .
* Until Friday morning.
* At 7 PM Thursday the stage was 13.7 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring and is forecast to continue.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* The river will continue rising to near 14.8 feet by late tonight. The
river will fall below flood stage early Friday morning.
* At 15 feet, minor flooding expands into the woodlands and
natural flood plain along the creek in the Piedmont National
Wildlife Refuge upstream and downstream from the gage on Round
Oak-Juliette Road. The rapid flow increases around 50 percent from
the flood stage level.
